title: Understanding the Concept
text: In statistics, a statistic is a numerical value that represents a characteristic of a sample. It is used to estimate the corresponding parameter of the population.

title: Sample vs. Population
text: A sample is a subset of the population, and the average height calculated from this sample is a statistic. The population would include all sunflowers in the field.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: The average height of the $$50$$ sunflowers is a numerical summary of the sample. What is this called in statistics?
